name: On the Other Side #ResistJam
description:
The nation's dictator followed through with his plans of creating a 1900 mile long wall, keeping immigrants from south of the border from entering the country. To no one's surprise, families were torn apart, some never to see each other again.

Dolores, a young latina girl lives motherless now near the wall itself. When Dolores's mother was deported, she withheld her true pain and fear, telling Dolores that she'd just be on the other side.

A-key: Move Dolores Left

D-key: Move Dolores Right

S-key: Duck behind bushed

V-key: Talk to people on the other side of the wall.

Art by Allyssa De La Torre

Game Design by Edwin Franco
